All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an admin user for the library system.
Book
Represents a book in the library.
BookFineStrategy
Calculates fines for overdue books.
Borrow
Represents a borrowing record of a media item by a user.
BorrowManager
Manages borrow operations in the library, including borrowing media, checking overdue items, calculating fines, and listing borrows.
CD
Represents a CD in the library.
CDFineStrategy
Calculates fines for overdue CDs.
EmailNotifier
Sends email notifications to users.
FineStrategy
Interface for fine calculation strategies.
Main
Main entry point for the Library System application.
Media
Abstract class representing a media item in the library.
MediaManager
Manages a collection of media items (Books and CDs).
Observer
Observer interface for receiving notifications about users.
ReminderService
Service that sends reminders to users with overdue borrows.
User
Represents a library user with a name, email, password, and fine balance.
UserManager
Manages library users: adding, finding, listing, and unregistering users.
